title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Slate Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Dan Kois discuss the Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
